member.name: P:Custom_Kitchens.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

members.member: when select kitchen button is pressed the following sub handles the event the program checks if any of the given countertops is selected and records the price of the selected item the routine also handles no input with an error message

member.name: M:Custom_Kitchens.Form1.refreshPrice
member.summary: this sub refreshes the price whenever the Purchase button is pressed it adds the prices of all selected appliances it also ensures the user selects an option between shipping and installation it handles this with an error message

member.name: M:Custom_Kitchens.Form1.btnProceed1_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: te last sub that runs when proceed button is clicked it hides the current form and takes the user to another form

member.name: M:Custom_Kitchens.Form2.checkEmptyFields
member.summary: creating a function that verifies all inputs have no blanks and verifies and validates all numeric inputs
